## Trigger.eventManipulation property

Events that fire the trigger (INSERT, UPDATE, DELETE, TRUNCATE).

**Signature:**

```typescript
eventManipulation: ("INSERT" | "UPDATE" | "DELETE" | "TRUNCATE")[];
```
